name: Monk
desc: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection
coolFeatures: Uses dexterity instead of strength for unarmed and weapon strikes
Unarmed strikes are much stronger and can stun people
Very acrobatic and hard to hit
Can catch arrows and throw them back
Monk Ways include: Shadow, Drunken Master, Four Elements, Kensei, Long Death, Open Hand, and Sun Soul
